title: Engine Building
subtitle: Custom Engine Assembly & Modifications
description: From stock to 800+ HP, we build and modify engines for performance and reliability.

sections.heading: Custom Engine Building
sections.text: Our expert engine builders specialize in creating high-performance powerplants tailored to your goals. Whether you're looking for daily driver reliability or maximum track performance, we have the expertise to deliver. We handle everything from block preparation and machine work to final assembly and dyno testing.

sections.heading: Services Offered
sections.text: We provide comprehensive engine building services including: block preparation, stroker kits, piston and rod selection, camshaft tuning, turbo upgrades, fuel system optimization, and complete dyno testing. Each build is customized to your vehicle's needs and performance targets.

sections.heading: Our Expertise
sections.text: With years of experience building engines that exceed 800+ HP, we understand the intricacies of forced induction, internal modifications, and durability. We work with quality components from trusted manufacturers and ensure every build is bulletproof and reliable.

title: Turbo Upgrades
subtitle: Forced Induction Specialists
description: Expert turbocharger selection, installation, and tuning for maximum boost.

sections.heading: Turbocharger Solutions
sections.text: We specialize in selecting and installing turbochargers that match your vehicle's power goals and driving style. From Garrett to BorgWarner, we work with leading manufacturers to find the perfect fit for your build.

sections.heading: Expert Installation
sections.text: Our installation process includes manifold upgrades, intercooler setup, piping optimization, and boost control tuning. We ensure every component works together seamlessly for maximum efficiency and reliability.

sections.heading: Boost Tuning & Dyno
sections.text: After installation, we perform complete dyno testing and ECU tuning to optimize boost pressure, fuel delivery, and timing. This ensures your turbo system delivers maximum power safely and reliably.

title: Suspension Tuning
subtitle: Handling & Performance Setup
description: Complete suspension upgrades and tuning for track and street performance.

sections.heading: Suspension Excellence
sections.text: A properly tuned suspension is critical for both daily driving comfort and track performance. We design and install complete suspension systems that balance responsiveness, comfort, and durability.

sections.heading: Suspension Upgrades
sections.text: We offer coilover installations, anti-roll bar upgrades, bracing systems, and adjustable suspension components. Each setup is tailored to your vehicle's weight, power, and intended use.

sections.heading: Alignment & Setup
sections.text: Proper alignment is crucial for handling and tire longevity. We perform detailed corner balancing and alignment setup using precision equipment to ensure optimal performance.

title: Drivetrain Services
subtitle: Transmissions & Differentials
description: Professional transmission, differential, and driveshaft services for all power levels.

sections.heading: Drivetrain Expertise
sections.text: We understand the challenges of delivering extreme power to the pavement. Our drivetrain services ensure your transmission and differential can handle whatever horsepower you produce.

sections.heading: Our Services
sections.text: We provide transmission builds, differential upgrades, custom driveshaft fabrication, axle specification, and clutch systems. Whether stock reliability or 800+ HP capability, we have solutions.

sections.heading: Reliability Engineering
sections.text: With experience building bullet-proof drivetrains that handle extreme loads, we know how to select components and tune systems for maximum durability and minimal wear.

title: ECU Tuning & Mapping
subtitle: Custom Engine Control Programming
description: Professional ECU tuning and custom mapping for optimal engine performance.

sections.heading: Custom ECU Tuning
sections.text: Modern engines are controlled by sophisticated computers. We specialize in custom ECU tuning that maximizes your engine's potential while maintaining reliability and safety.

sections.heading: Tuning Services
sections.text: We offer fuel mapping, ignition timing optimization, boost control programming, rev limiters, anti-lag systems, and custom datalogs. Every tune is dyno-tested and verified for reliability.

sections.heading: Precision Engineering
sections.text: Using professional tuning software and dyno equipment, we dial in every aspect of your engine's operation. The result is maximum power, improved efficiency, and bulletproof reliability.

title: Custom Fabrication
subtitle: Steel & Aluminum Welding
description: Expert custom fabrication services for brackets, manifolds, cages, and more.

sections.heading: Fabrication Services
sections.text: From custom intake manifolds to roll cages, our fabrication team can build almost anything. We combine engineering knowledge with welding expertise to create strong, functional components.

sections.heading: Our Capabilities
sections.text: We specialize in TIG and MIG welding, CNC machining, custom bracket fabrication, manifold work, exhaust design, and structural reinforcement. All work is performed to the highest standards.

sections.heading: Custom Design & Build
sections.text: Whether you have a specific design in mind or need engineering consultation, we can help. Our team can fabricate one-off parts or production runs with precision and quality.
